name: Shinkai: Travel Itinerary Planner
description: Tool for creating a budget-friendly travel itinerary based on available activities
author: Shinkai

sqlTables.name: activities
sqlTables.definition: CREATE TABLE activities (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, cost DECIMAL NOT NULL, destination VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL)

sqlQueries.name: Get all activities for a destination
Get budget-friendly activities for a destination
sqlQueries.query: SELECT name, cost FROM activities WHERE destination = :destination AND cost <= :max_budget_per_day ORDER BY cost ASC
